main_definition: To be exact, accurate, or clearly expressed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exact in terms of details and accuracy.
meanings_and_examples.example: The tailor took precise measurements to ensure the suit fit perfectly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Clearly stated or formulated without ambiguity.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her instructions were so precise that her employees had no questions about their tasks.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To describe something in detail with careful attention to accuracy and exactness.
meanings_and_examples.example: The scientist was able to provide a very precise explanation of the chemical reaction.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having no room for doubt or error; exact.
meanings_and_examples.example: He made his point in an extremely precise manner, leaving no room for misunderstanding.
